TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ResXDataNode extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ResXDataNode Implements ISerializable

summary.span: 表示 XML 資源 (.resx) 檔案中的項目。

span.span: Represents an element in an XML resource (.resx) file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別支援的資源檔中的豐富的資料類型的表示法。The class supports the representation of rich data types within a resource file. 只要物件支援序列化和類型的編輯器，它可以在資源檔，支援任何物件的儲存的體。It can support the storage of any object in a resource file, so long as the object supports serialization and type editors. 您可以建立藉由呼叫其中一個多載的類別建構函式的物件。You can create a object by calling one of its overloaded class constructors. 您可以再加入資源項目或項目資源檔藉由呼叫方法。You can then add the resource item or element to a resource file by calling the method. 若要擷取現有物件，您必須列舉所具現化 XML 資源檔中的物件物件，設定屬性設`true`，並呼叫方法取得列舉值。To retrieve an existing object, you must enumerate the objects in an XML resource file by instantiating a object, setting the property to `true`, and calling the method to get an enumerator. 這個範例將提供說明。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以取得物件，可用來列舉.resx 檔案中的物件。The following example uses the method to obtain an object that is used to enumerate the objects in a .resx file. 此範例也包含`CreateResourceFile`常式，它會建立必要的 XML 資源檔。The example includes a `CreateResourceFile` routine that creates the necessary XML resource file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXDataNode.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxdatanode.class/cs/resxresourcereader2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXDataNode.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxdatanode.class/vb/resxresourcereader2.vb#1)] 因為屬性是`true`，值屬性是物件而不是資源的值。Because the property is `true`, the value of the property is a object rather than the resource value. 這可讓資源項目的註解可從屬性。This makes a resource item's comment available from the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定有關這個資源的任意註解。

span.span: Gets or sets an arbitrary comment regarding this resource.
A string that represents the comment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果註解不指派給資源項目，值屬性是。If a comment has not been assigned to the resource item, the value of the property is . 您存取屬性以具現化現有的 XML 資源檔中的資料節點物件，設定屬性設`true`，然後呼叫方法來擷取物件，可用來列舉 XML 資源檔中的項目。You access the property of an data node in an existing XML resource file by instantiating a object, setting the property to `true`, and calling the method to retrieve an object that you use to enumerate the items in the XML resource file. 屬性會傳回物件。The property returns the object. ## Examples 範例，請參閱類別。See the example for the class.

span.span: A structure that specifies the location of this resource in the resource file as a line position () and a column position ().

returns.span: 如果此資源不是資源檔的一部分，這個方法會傳回結構，其為 0 和為 0。

span.span: If this resource is not part of a resource file, this method returns a structure that has an of 0 and a of 0.

summary.span: 擷取這個節點所儲存的物件。

span.span: Retrieves the object that is stored by this node.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetValue(class System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService typeResolver) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (typeResolver As ITypeResolutionService) As Object

param.name: typeResolver
param.span: 要查詢的型別轉換子時，使用的型別解析服務。

span.span: The type resolution service to use when looking for a type converter.

summary.span: 擷取這個節點所儲存使用指定的型別解析服務的物件。

span.span: Retrieves the object that is stored by this node by using the specified type resolution service.
The object that corresponds to the stored value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果預存的值目前存在於記憶體中，它會直接傳回。If the stored value currently exists in memory, it is returned directly. 它會儲存在資源檔，則不需檔案的參考，如果會尋找藉由使用指定的型別解析服務，可以從字串轉換為適當的物件。If it is stored in the resource file and it is not a file reference, looks for a by using the specified type resolution service that can convert from a string to the appropriate object. 如果資源檔案參考，嘗試將它還原序列化。If the resource is a file reference, tries to de-serialize it.

exception.span: 找不到對應的型別，或適當的型別轉換子無法使用。

span.span: The corresponding type could not be found, or an appropriate type converter is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetValue(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName[] names) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (names As AssemblyName()) As Object

param.name: names
param.span: 若要搜尋的物件類型的組件清單。

span.span: The list of assemblies to search for the type of the object.

summary.span: 擷取這個節點所儲存搜尋指定的組件的物件。

span.span: Retrieves the object that is stored by this node by searching the specified assemblies.
The object that corresponds to the stored value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果預存的值目前存在於記憶體中，它會直接傳回。If the stored value currently exists in memory, it is returned directly. 它會儲存在資源檔，則不需檔案的參考，如果組件中識別的名稱來找不到物件的對應類型，看起來，然後尋找，可以將字串轉換到適當的物件。If it is stored in the resource file and it is not a file reference, looks in the assemblies identified by names to find the object's corresponding type, and then looks for a that can convert from a string to the appropriate object. 如果資源檔案參考，會嘗試將它還原序列化。If the resource is a file reference, tries to deserialize it.

exception.span: 找不到對應的型別，或適當的型別轉換子無法使用。

span.span: The corresponding type could not be found, or an appropriate type converter is not available.
Retrieves the type name for the value.

summary.span: 將序列化目標物件所需要的資料填入 物件中。

span.span: Populates a object with the data needed to serialize the target object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
